column4: How do I get my webcam to work in ubuntu?  It is installed in my laptop.
tryin to make it work with Flash?
I don't think so trying to use it with anything right now i have installed cheese and it says no camera, but specifically i want to use it with teamviewer CaptainTrek
okay.  do me a favor: pastebin me the output of the commands (in terminal) of: lspci and lsusb
ok I put it on pastebin but do not know where to see the link
the issue is that your system isn't even recognizing that the camera is there
it would have been listed under one of those commands
ok so now what it lookslike it is there in the devicemanager
it might just be a weird bug, I know that the webcam on my system isn't recognized in ubuntu even though the system says its there
not sure what to do then
interesting that the command line cant see the camera, considering everything GUI is just a front-end for terminal commands :P
i'm not sure exactly how to fix it unfortunately
